image_1.description: Dialog State Tracking is the event or process being researched, which involves tracking user goals and intentions in task-oriented dialog systems.

image_2.description: DS-DST model is the proposed dual strategy model for Dialogue State Tracking (DST), utilizing BERT for encoding and slot gate classification.
image_2.reason: The image clearly shows the architecture of a DS-DST model, which includes two BERT models: one fixed for categorical slot-value prediction and another fine-tuned for non-categorical slot-value prediction. The text also describes the use of BERT in this context, aligning with the visual representation.
